properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 4 at 7:41PM EST until February 5 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Louisville KY
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky...

Rough River near Dundee

affecting the following counties in Kentucky...Ohio.

.Continued rainfall over the next few days will cause the river to rise.

The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Rough River near Dundee.
* from late tonight to Wednesday afternoon.
* At  5:45 PM Tuesday the stage was 22.9 feet.
* Flood stage is 25.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by early Wednesday and continue
to rise to near 25.3 feet by Wednesday morning. The river will fall
below flood stage by Wednesday afternoon.
* Impact...At 25.0 feet...County roads between Dundee and Narrows
flood.
* Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 25.1
feet on Dec 16 2018.
properties.instruction:
If you are affected by these crests take any necessary actions.
Additional information is available at
water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lmk.
